mapper.select: SELECT du.id AS userId, du.nickname AS userNickName, dp.role AS userCurRole, dg.id AS gameId, dg.description AS gameDesc FROM d_user du LEFT JOIN (d_game dg JOIN d_player dp ON dp.game_id = dg.id AND dg.status != 4) ON du.id = dp.user_id WHERE du.id = #{userId};

SELECT du.id AS toUserId, du.nickname AS toUserNickname, du.avatar AS toUserAvatar, du.motto AS toUserMotto FROM d_user du WHERE du.id IN
#{item}

SELECT dom.chat_id AS chatId, dom.from_user_id AS fromUserId, dom.content AS content, dom.create_time AS createTime FROM d_offline_message dom WHERE dom.to_user_id = #{userId};
DELETE FROM d_offline_message WHERE to_user_id = #{userId};
